About Us
About Kinks Couture
Kinks Couture is More Than a Salon — it’s a sanctuary where natural beauty and holistic haircare converge to create an empowering and uplifting experience. We are not just about styling hair; we are about restoring its health, celebrating its unique beauty, and building a community where everyone feels seen, valued, and inspired.
Our Story
Kinks Couture was founded by Annmarie Clinton, a master hair specialist and entrepreneur with over 24 years of experience in natural haircare. Annmarie’s journey began at just seven years old, braiding her doll’s hair, and evolved into a lifelong passion for restoring and celebrating natural hair. Today, her vision has made Kinks Couture a trusted name in South Florida’s natural hair community.
With two locations in Pembroke Pines and Cutler Bay, Kinks Couture is more than a salon—it’s a haven for individuals seeking not only stunning hairstyles but also a transformative journey toward healthier hair and scalp. Our holistic approach combines innovative techniques, custom organic treatments, and therapeutic services designed to nourish, regrow, and repair natural hair.
What Makes Us Different?
At Kinks Couture, we go beyond the surface. Our priority is the health of your hair and scalp because we believe that vibrant, healthy hair creates the best styles. Every service we offer is infused with care, integrity, and innovation. Our exclusive Growth Organics product line, made from natural ingredients like fruits, herbs, and ocean elements, is just one example of how we set the standard for holistic haircare.
We’ve also earned the trust of our community, receiving accolades such as six consecutive “Best of Pembroke Pines Awards” and being inducted into the Pembroke Pines Business Hall of Fame. Kinks Couture has also been featured in Essence magazine as South Florida’s hotspot for natural hairstyles.
Our Mission
Kinks Couture is here to do more than style hair—we’re here to restore confidence, celebrate natural beauty, and empower you to embrace your unique texture. Whether you’re looking for expert care for locs, protective styles, or scalp and hair restoration, our team of highly skilled specialists brings 5 to over 30 years of experience to every appointment.
The Future of Kinks Couture
Our commitment to innovation continues with the upcoming launch of AquaFro, a pioneering haircare line tailored for Black swimmers. Set to debut in Spring 2025, AquaFro reflects our dedication to creating solutions for overlooked needs in the natural hair community.
This structure delivers an inspiring, clear, and compelling story while showcasing your expertise, credibility, and passion. It creates a strong emotional connection and emphasizes what makes Kinks Couture unique.
Our Philosophy:
Holistic Haircare at Its Best
At Kinks Couture, we believe that truly beautiful hair styles begins with healthy hair and scalp. Our philosophy, rooted in Holistic Haircare, goes beyond styling—it’s about nurturing and restoring your hair from the inside out.
We combine our expertise in natural hair styling with the healing properties of nature to create personalized solutions for every client. Whether you’re seeking protective styles, braids, locs, or custom treatments, we prioritize the overall health and vitality of your hair and scalp. Every service is designed to repair, regrow, and restore, ensuring your hair thrives in its natural state.
Our highly skilled team is trained in advanced techniques and committed to using only the best, all-natural products. From our Growth Organics line to our signature steam therapies, we focus on providing treatments that are as effective as they are gentle.
At Kinks Couture, we don’t just make you look good—we help you feel great, confident, and empowered to embrace your natural beauty.
HEALTHY HAIR
Meet the Visionary Behind Kinks Couture
From braiding her doll’s hair as a young girl to owning and operating two thriving salons, Annmarie Clinton has always been driven by a passion for hairstyling and a purpose to empower. Her journey began with a childhood love for hair and evolved into a mission to create a space where natural hair is celebrated and cared for.
Annmarie founded Kinks Couture with the vision of not just styling hair, but restoring its health and helping clients embrace the beauty of their natural textures. Her dedication to holistic haircare inspired the creation of Growth Organics, a signature product line crafted from all-natural ingredients. Designed to nurture, restore, and maintain the health of kinky, coily, and curly hair, Growth Organics embodies Annmarie’s commitment to providing effective, gentle, and nature-inspired solutions for her clients.
With over 24 years of experience as an innovative product developer, master trainer and entrepreneur, Annmarie continues to set the standard for excellence in natural hair care, creating transformative experiences for every client who walks through her doors.
A Message From Our General Manager, Harold Keith
Working with Kinks Couture over the last few years has been an eye-opening journey. It’s a culture that has allowed me to grow creatively, make a greater impact, and embrace new adventures. I’m beyond proud to be part of such an innovative, passionate, and dedicated team who not only love what they do but are committed to making a difference in the lives of every client that we service.
Call me biased, but I truly believe we have the best team and clients in all of South Florida! I’m excited to witness—and actively contribute to—our expansion and global impact. After all, we don’t just do hair, we protect it. If you haven’t checked us out yet, do so, and you’ll see why we’re the best at what we do
What We Do
We help you reach your goals, through Styling and some kink
Solutions to help you feel better
HAIR IS OUR PASSION
Why Choose Kinks Couture?
Expertise and Experience
With over two decades of professional experience, founder Annmarie Clinton has trained and mentored our team to deliver top-tier services tailored to each client’s unique needs. Our stylists bring a wealth of knowledge, advanced techniques, and a shared passion for holistic haircare to every appointment.
Custom Organic Treatments
Our exclusive Growth Organics line is crafted from the finest natural ingredients, including natural oils, herbs, fruits, vegetables, and ocean elements. These custom treatments are designed to address a range of hair concerns, such as dryness, breakage, itchy scalp, and protein deficiency, offering personalized care to restore and maintain healthy, vibrant hair.
Award-Winning Service
Named one of South Florida’s top natural hair salons by Essence Magazine, Kinks Couture is synonymous with excellence. We’ve been honored as the “Best Hair Salon of Pembroke Pines” for six consecutive years and proudly inducted into the Pembroke Pines Business Hall of Fame. These accolades reflect our unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and community impact.
At Kinks Couture, we combine expertise, personalized care, and a deep respect for natural beauty to provide an unmatched haircare experience.
Our Community and Values
At Kinks Couture, community is at the heart of everything we do. Our Kid Zone is designed to teach children to embrace and care for their natural textures, helping them build a foundation of self-confidence that lasts a lifetime. We are also dedicated to supporting working mothers, single parents, and families from diverse backgrounds, including those seeking guidance on caring for African American children’s hair.
Our commitment goes beyond styling—we empower families with the knowledge and tools to care for their hair independently. By fostering education, pride, and connection, we create a welcoming space where everyone feels valued and supported in their natural hair journey.
Natural Hair is What We Do

Find answers to popular questions
I want to start my locs journey, how do I make an appointment?
Start-up locs require a consultation before booking an appointment. We offer free consultation with our locticians, where they can assess your hair and decide the best technique to start your locs.
Do I have to pay for a consultation?
We offer free consultation.
Do I pay extra for getting my hair washed?
All the hair styles that we offer come with a complimentary wash and conditioner.  You only pay for hair care where wash and conditioning your hair is only what you are scheduled for.
